website_summaries.verdict: A large charcoal barrel grill with a side firebox to offer a larger cooking space and a wider variety of cooking options.
pros: Dyna-Glo's offset smoker provides 730 square inches of total cooking space
The steel unit features porcelain-enameled cook grates, an analogue temperature gauge, and cool-to-the-touch handles
The removable side ash pan provides convenient access to fuel and ash
cons: Some of the models may leak smoke when cooking, which is not an ideal situation

website_summaries.verdict: A versatile smoker/grill that provides 443 sq. in. of primary cooking area and 287 sq. in. of offset cooking area.
pros: The cool-touch handles remove the risk of burning your hands when opening either of the unit's lids, while the porcelain enameled steel grates are designed to retain heat for more even cooking
The removable offset charcoal grate allows quick and easy access to refuel or to clear away ash
cons: Overall, there aren't too many cons to this smoker other than an occasional faulty or missing part, which the manufacturer will make good on

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Made some mods and put it to the test. Passed with flying colors! The temp holds perfect and the short barrel doesn't require any baffles for an even temp across the cooking surface. Recommend this little guy HIGHLY!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Holgate

customer_reviews.title: Smoke leaks
customer_reviews.text: The smoker/grill leaks smoke almost everywhere. I was warned about this problem so I had the seals to put on to stop the smoke leaks. I have found out that stopping one leak leads to another. The only way to find the smoke leaks is to fix one and another shows up. I think that when the leaks are all fixed this grill/smoker will be just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Flavor was thro the roof
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty smoker. Works great. Flavor was thro the roof! Last smoker/grill to buy. I've used it for a month now and I'm extremely satisfied. You must season the grill prior to use. After a few uses, you'll notice the flavor gets better. Very little smoke escapes by the door hinges. Basically a smoking crock pot
customer_reviews.author: Steve Margel

customer_reviews.title: NO!
customer_reviews.text: The weld connecting the door to the barrel broke upon first use of the grill. I cannot verify this was made in China, but it is consistent w\ that type of product. Manual states 30 minutes to assemble. Whomever wrote this had to having been moving through several time zones. after @ least 20 minutes of unpacking, you will spend the next 90 minutes assembling it. No!
customer_reviews.author: M. Nowlan

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer...but the grill lid broke off
customer_reviews.text: Great price and packaging. It was easy to assemble. Just use common sense when building the smoker box. You don’t need the legs. I’m happy with the grill/smoker’s overall performance. After owning it, and keeping it covered, for about six weeks, a lid assembly weld failed. Trying to wrangle a 300 degree lid one-handed is fun. I’ve contacted the manufacturer and they’re reviewing my claim for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M. AUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter smoker
customer_reviews.text: For the $ you won't find a better ready to go offset smoker. Was able to maintain a decent range of temperature out of the box and smoke a quality brisket product from the get-go. Recommend addition of high temp sealing gasket tape where needed and definitely purchase a remote thermometer so you can constantly monitor the temperature from inside. Only thing I'd recommend to the manufacturer is to keep an eye on assembly components as I was missing a few screws and had difficulty in places.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Good solid smoker
customer_reviews.text: If you want a boiler plate heavy steel smoker - this ain't it. Still, it is a good smoker that has performed well for me. Ribs, brisket, chicken, are all done without hitting 300+ degrees. It really likes to keep 225 degrees (60-70 F outside temp) and can easily do lower if that is want you want. People that have tried the meat that have come off of it have been impressed. I looked at several others but this one caught me eye. I especially like being able to remove the ashes/coals when done to prevent rusting. Putting it together was easy over a couple of cold beverages.
customer_reviews.author: D. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is great for 2 to 3 racks of ribs but the bbq works very well. Mine came with missing parts but was able to have them shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for grill
customer_reviews.text: This pit was easy to put together and easier to use. We're extremely happy with our choice and look forward to 4th of July cookout
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smoker, and great for a small family
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this setup! I sealed with high temp silicon, put a high temp gasket around the firebox, and seasoned it. Couldn’t ask for a better grill.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're lucky
customer_reviews.text: Main grill body was great. However, side box could not be put together. Comes in two pieces that are supposed to fit together clam shell style. Couldn't make the holes line up no matter what I tried. Couldn't even make the edges of the bottom line up with the top so I could drill new holes. Measured diagonally across the corners of top piece. 24.25" one way, 25" the other. The whole thing wasn't square. Couldn't believe a modern factory could make something that badly.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H. Webb

customer_reviews.title: This is a real smoker, don't settle for less
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this piece of equipment is outstanding. Dyna-glo put extra effort into building a smoker/grill that is durable on all fronts. The materials used are thicker and stronger than other comparable smokers, once built it is sturdy, and there are no areas on it that are going to break off. Smoking in it is only good, as it leaks smoke quite a bit. Also, if left in the rain, the temperature gauge gets water stuck in it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Zych

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice pit. Directions were hidden under the flap of the bottpm of rhe box. Found them after i put it together and was breaking down the boxes. Cooks great. Lots of room on the grill. Nice set up. Heavier steel than many other grills. Bigger tires is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A versatile smoker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Had it assembled through Amazon services and the firebox legs were left on the firebox which I thought distracting from the beauty of the unit. It is constructed soundly and allowed me to use the main unit charcoal grate as an extra food grill since I only use the unit for indirect smoking. Temp control could be better but is acceptable. The slide out firebox grate is a plus making the unit a good deal for the price. Durability, of course, is yet to be determined but in this capacity a lot can be cooked at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Husband wanted it.
customer_reviews.text: Buy an external thermometer. But the grill has survived every weather condition you can imagine. No cover or anything and it's still kicking!
customer_reviews.author: Alexius A. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Dyna glo
customer_reviews.text: I've been smoking foods now for over 10 years, this product is very well built and has nice features but it takes a lot longer than a half hour to puts together it took me 4 hours it had some parts missing or wrong size overall I like it and it's well balanced for easy moving.the shipping co. was not careful it had several small dents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use UPS To deliver a grill like this again they must have dropped it😡
customer_reviews.text: The grill is ok for the money but the shipping was ruff the grill was bent on one end and the smoke stack top damper was broken and the temperature gauge is missing the rubber plug that goes in the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: read instructions
customer_reviews.text: Assemble was about 2 hours. Used seal tape for the first time and the grill holds temp steady. I have used it twice for a brisket and a turkey so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Smoker works fine
customer_reviews.text: I like the smoker..sturdy..temp control is tricky though and it leaks smoke at the hinges, but can be fixed with heat resistant weather stripping. I purchased warranty protection from ASSURION, but NEVER received any confirmation or email from them. Even after, I wrote to Amazon about it. ASSURION did this to me before on another purchase. Shady.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mallett

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This was a late Christmas present to myself back in January. This is my first smoker and I absolutely love it. The craftsman's shift is second to none. Holds a great temp and has plenty room. At one time you can fit either 1 large brisket, 2 pork butts, 3 chickens, or 3 slabs of ribs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin James

customer_reviews.title: Rusted fast
customer_reviews.text: Rusted very quickly in a short amount of time. In 3 months time it has a lot of rust on the inner part of hood.we have taken care of and have a cover for it when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill. Provides excellent control in getting the right ...
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. Provides excellent control in getting the right cooking temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: DJD77

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. The materials are heavy duty and the offset smoker provides consistent heat and smoke for any type of meat. Would recommend this to my friends. I can buy a lot of meat for what I saved over pricey smokers that I doubt I could get better results with.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker ! The only thing I had to improve was. The paint
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Stull

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I thought my other grill was nice but it has nothing on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker holds heat good
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker. Very heavy duty. Just smoked 4 round pork tenderloins on it, they came out awesome. Would highly recommend this smoker. Don't know why you would need seals on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Eby

customer_reviews.title: Well built, versatile smoker and grill.
customer_reviews.text: Great Smoker and grill. I've had it for over a year now and it is extremely well built, solid. Versatile in that you can slow smoke or use it as a grill. Season it correctly and get the cover and it should last you a long time. Extremely happy with this purchase. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen C. Murphy

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGSS730CBO-D-KIT Signature SeriesBarrel Charcoal Grill & Side Firebox
product_meta.description: Style:Signature SmokerExpand your outdoor cooking horizons with the Dyna-Glo Signature Series DGS730CBO-D Barrel Charcoal Grill & Offset Smoker Box. This multifunctional grill converts into an offset smoker or provides additional cooking space. This grill is equipped with a removable charcoal grate and ash pan, which offers easy access to fuel and quick disposal of ash. The porcelain enameled steel cooking grates allow for maximum heat transfer and searing. Diversify your range of cooking options with this Signature grill from Dyna-Glo.
feature_bullets: Primary cooking area is 443 square inches
Offset cooking area is 287 square inches
Total cooking area is 730 square inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars70 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
